description.value:
This long, gnarled staff looks like several bones fused together, then wrapped tightly with strips of desiccated, gray skin. At the top of the staff, a clump of sinew clasps a small stone orb resembling a large human eye. When the staff is activated, this eye twitches and glances around randomly. When wielding this staff, you gain a +1 item bonus to visual Perception checks.

Activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cast a Spell]

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Read Aura]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.True Strike]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Darkvision], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Flaming Sphere] (creates what appears to be a large eye made of fire), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.See Invisibility]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Organsight], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Web of Eyes]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clairvoyance], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Countless Eyes], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Detect Scrying]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

source.value: Pathfinder Adventure: Crown of the Kobold King
